about_the_game:
Edge of the Wild is a single-player, third-person, survival-adventure game set on a breathtaking but dangerous Alaskan island, inspired by games like the original Tomb Raider  series and Ark: Survival Evolved.

Step into the rugged boots of Sara Avalon as an intrepid nature photographer. Dropped off on a frigid, remote island, your mission is to capture the beauty of it's wildlife through your lens, but also survive against dynamically changing weather, dangerous animals, and perilous terrain.

As a secondary objective, you are to check up on a team of archeologists who have mysteriously gone missing after making a remarkable discovery in the islands melting snow.

Gameplay:

• Survive: Health, food, water, and stamina must be managed carefully to avoid disaster.

• Explore: Discover unique ruins and landmarks that unfold a compelling story and take you to unexpected places.

• Fight: Experience third-person combat as you defend against natural enemies (bears, wolves, etc.) and other adversaries using a range of firearms (pistol, machine gun, sniper rifle).

• Build: Build a home base from which you can strike out into the wilderness or shelter from the environment.

• Photograph: An advanced photo mode will allow you to take captivating photographs of the surrounding wildlife and terrain as well as document your journey. Focus, F-Stop, lighting, color balance, custom framing, and more can be adjusted to perfectly capture your experience.

Features:

• Immersive Visuals: Stunning environment that bring the wilderness to life, with interesting animal behavior and dynamic environmental effects.

• Wildlife Interactions: Encounter a variety of animals with unique behaviors. Study their patterns to safely capture them on film or avoid danger.

• Resource Management: Balance the need to explore and photograph with the necessity to find food, water, and shelter. Shoot an animal with your camera to capture it's wild beauty? ...or shoot with bullets to survive?

• Narrative Depth: Experience an adventure that begins in the ordinary, though dangerous, Alaskan wilderness, but rapidly turns sci-fi as Sara’s discoveries, journal entries, and interactions with the environment unfold a compelling story.

NOTE: All of the gameplay and features listed above will be included upon release. How they appear and function however are subject to change as this game is currently in development.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains some elements that may not be suitable for all audiences. Such things include revealing clothing and acts of violence with firearms and other weapons.

short_description: Edge of the Wild is a survival adventure game where you play as Sara Avalon, a nature photographer left on a remote Alaskan island. Tasked to photograph the island's wildlife, Sara must navigate and survive the harsh environment, and uncover the island's hidden secrets.
